general.title: Pingu Portfolio | Professional Roblox Developer
general.description: Portfolio of Pingu, a professional Roblox Developer specializing in high-quality maps, models, and immersive environments.
general.keywords: Roblox, Builder, Developer, Pingu, Maps, Models
general.author: Pingu

bio.short: Passionate Roblox developer with 3+ years of experience.
bio.long: Hi, I'm Pingu, a passionate Roblox developer who has been developing for 3 years and I am dedicated to creating amazing, innovative and engaging experiences for everyone. I'm always pushing the boundaries of what was thought to be possible in Roblox. I am able to create high quality builds while also keeping the optimization throughout the builds.
